title: Spinach and ricotta puff pastry Christmas tree
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '2 red onions, chopped', '250g fresh spinach', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '250g fresh ricotta cheese', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '1 sheet puff pastry, thawed if frozen', '1 egg, beaten', '4 cherry tomatoes, halved, or more to taste']
